__e: Why, I remember you as well as anything that night we both turned up at the theatre.
The first time I saw you, and tonight... e agora depois de tanto tempo
I want to know if I can knock on this door again tomorrow night, or if this is just what it is, like that night in the office.
Where you were that night and what you did.
All you have to do is go back back to that night and be there.
No, I haven't talked to him since that night, and I don't want to ever, because of what-- because of what he did.
All you have to do is go back back to that night and be there.
No, I haven't talked to him since that night, and I don't want to ever, because of what-- because of what he did.
I want to know if I can knock on this door again tomorrow night, or if this is just what it is, like that night in the office.
But that woman who showed up yesterday... the crazy one... she better be here every single day.
Look at that woman and tell me if you recognize her.
I just had to know what had become of that woman... whom I hadn't seen in 9 years.
Ohhh...! You're the young fella who was with that girl, aren't you?
That girl is at the summerhouse.
One night I said it to me girl, and now me girl's me wife.
Except for that one time in college when... you and I... but that was just... midsummer madness.
It was like that time in the hotel room when they came and told me that you were hurt and that I'd done it.
It's kind of like that time we did it on my parents' bed.
Doesn't it remind you of the time you and I...
You know, on my way over here I was thinking about that time--
That's why you came to see me back then, isn't it?
What was it you... you said about me once?
Doesn't it remind you of the time you and I...
I know that she has felt far from you since those days... but I know you have never left her side.
It's daft, but I haven't ever thanked you for that time and like I said, I wouldn't have missed it for the world.
Because it's part of what made you who you are today. Just like that time in my life made me who I am.
I mean, we can either go to the girl that's the closest or we can go to the one that hasn't eaten in a week.
Mother is the one who makes us feel that we are very good, And there's no one better than us.
I would have done anything for you, my mother, she who gave me life.
